section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:Chiffres::Chiffre
Core abstraction of the Chiffres monetary system Chiffres::CyclePhase
Position within a natural or symbolic cycle Chiffres::Ether
Collective monetary field in the Chiffres system Chiffres::EthicsScore
Ethical score associated with an actor or portfolio Chiffres::Memory
Memory of past wallet behavior
